Source.Name: pencil
Source.Summary: For making diagrams and GUI prototyping
Source.Description:
The Pencil Project's unique mission is to build a free and opensource tool for making diagrams and GUI prototyping that everyone can use.
Pencil will always be free as it is released under the GPL version 2 and is available for virtually all platforms that Firefox 3 can run.
http://pencil.evolus.vn/WikiIndex.html
http://pencil.evolus.vn/wiki/devguide/Introduction.html
